antimage_spell_shield.name: Spell Shield
antimage_spell_shield.scepterDescription: Causes Spell Shield to passively block and reflect a targeted spell once every 12 seconds.

axe_battle_hunger.name: Battle Hunger
axe_battle_hunger.scepterDescription: Battle Hunger provides -30% damage output reduction. Applies Battle Hunger on nearby enemies after a successful Culling Blade.

bane_brain_sap.name: Brain Sap
bane_brain_sap.scepterDescription: Decreases cooldown and makes Brain Sap pierce Spell Immunity.

bloodseeker_rupture.name: Rupture
bloodseeker_rupture.scepterDescription: Grants 2 charges to Rupture with a 40 seconds replenish time.

drow_ranger_marksmanship.name: Marksmanship
drow_ranger_marksmanship.scepterDescription: Causes Drow Ranger's attacks to splinter on the target, hitting nearby units with normal attacks that deal reduced damage.

earthshaker_enchant_totem.name: Enchant Totem
earthshaker_enchant_totem.scepterDescription: Enchant Totem becomes a 900 range ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there.  Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping.

kunkka_ghostship.name: Ghostship
kunkka_ghostship.scepterDescription: Drags enemies with the Ghostship towards the crash site. Enemies are still able to perform actions while being dragged.

lina_laguna_blade.name: Laguna Blade
lina_laguna_blade.scepterDescription: Changes Laguna Blade's damage type to Pure, and allows it to slice through spell immunity.

lion_finger_of_death.name: Finger of Death
lion_finger_of_death.scepterDescription: Increases damage. Decreases cooldown. Finger of Death hits all units in a small area.

mirana_starfall.name: Starstorm
mirana_starfall.scepterDescription: Passively triggers Starstorm every 10 seconds. Does not trigger if the enemy doesn't see Mirana.

phantom_lancer_spirit_lance.name: Spirit Lance
phantom_lancer_spirit_lance.scepterDescription: Causes Spirit Lance to bounce on nearby enemies.

puck_dream_coil.name: Dream Coil
puck_dream_coil.scepterDescription: Increases damage from coil breaks, increases coil duration, coil break stun goes through spell immunity.

shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward.name: Mass Serpent Ward
shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward.scepterDescription: Causes Serpent Wards to have split shot, attacking two units for full damage. Increases attack range of Serpent Wards.

razor_eye_of_the_storm.name: Eye of the Storm
razor_eye_of_the_storm.scepterDescription: Causes faster strikes that can damage structures as well.  When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.

skeleton_king_reincarnation.name: Reincarnation
skeleton_king_reincarnation.scepterDescription: If a nearby allied hero is slain, they will be transformed into a wraith and have their death delayed for 7 seconds.

sven_gods_strength.name: God's Strength
sven_gods_strength.scepterDescription: God's Strength grants bonus damage to allies in a 900 radius.

storm_spirit_electric_vortex.name: Electric Vortex
storm_spirit_electric_vortex.scepterDescription: Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.

sandking_burrowstrike.name: Burrowstrike
sandking_burrowstrike.scepterDescription: Adds Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit by your Burrowstrike and doubles its cast range. Does not apply Caustic Finale to illusions.

tidehunter_gush.name: Gush
tidehunter_gush.scepterDescription: Gush becomes a ground targeted wave ability that affects enemy units in a line.  Decreases cooldown.

vengefulspirit_command_aura.name: Vengeance Aura
vengefulspirit_command_aura.scepterDescription: Causes the Vengeance Illusion to be able to cast abilities (but not items).

vengefulspirit_nether_swap.name: Nether Swap
vengefulspirit_nether_swap.scepterDescription: Decreases Netherswap charge restore time, allows swapping of non-hero units.

crystal_maiden_freezing_field.name: Freezing Field
crystal_maiden_freezing_field.scepterDescription: Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over 2.5 seconds.

windrunner_focusfire.name: Focus Fire
windrunner_focusfire.scepterDescription: Reduces cooldown, decreases damage reduction, and removes debuffs from item effects.

lich_chain_frost.name: Chain Frost
lich_chain_frost.scepterDescription: Increases damage and casting range. Removes the limit on the number of times Chain Frost can jump.

witch_doctor_death_ward.name: Death Ward
witch_doctor_death_ward.scepterDescription: Death Ward attacks have True Strike and bounce between nearby enemies.

riki_tricks_of_the_trade.name: Tricks of the Trade
riki_tricks_of_the_trade.scepterDescription: Increases duration and allows you to target an allied hero, hiding inside them for the duration.

enigma_black_hole.name: Black Hole
enigma_black_hole.scepterDescription: Adds the current level of Midnight Pulse to Black Hole.

tinker_laser.name: Laser
tinker_laser.scepterDescription: Causes Laser to refract between all visible enemy units within range.

sniper_assassinate.name: Assassinate
sniper_assassinate.scepterDescription: Turns Assassinate into a ground target AoE ability, that after the channel period launches a critical strike and procs headshot on units in the AoE. Only affects visible heroes.

warlock_rain_of_chaos.name: Chaotic Offering
warlock_rain_of_chaos.scepterDescription: Calls 2 Golems with reduced stats and bounty.

viper_viper_strike.name: Viper Strike
viper_viper_strike.scepterDescription: Decreases mana cost and cooldown, and increases cast range.

luna_eclipse.name: Eclipse
luna_eclipse.scepterDescription: Allows Luna to cast Eclipse on an allied unit or herself and have its effects follow them, or cast it on an area. Also increases total beams and duration, removes the limit on beams per unit, and makes the beams appear twice as fast.

dazzle_shallow_grave.name: Shallow Grave
dazzle_shallow_grave.scepterDescription: Causes Shallow Grave to be an AoE spell.

leshrac_lightning_storm.name: Lightning Storm
leshrac_lightning_storm.scepterDescription: While Pulse Nova is active, Lightning Storm will hit one random unit in a radius every 1.75 seconds.

furion_wrath_of_nature.name: Wrath of Nature
furion_wrath_of_nature.scepterDescription: Increases damage. If a unit is killed by Wrath of Nature, or within 4 seconds thereafter, a Nature's Call treant will spawn. These treants' health and damage are based on the current level of Nature's Call. If a hero is killed, a Greater Treant will be created, which has 3 times as much health and damage.

dark_seer_wall_of_replica.name: Wall of Replica
dark_seer_wall_of_replica.scepterDescription: Increases the damage dealt by illusions.

omniknight_guardian_angel.name: Guardian Angel
omniknight_guardian_angel.scepterDescription: Increases duration, radius becomes global and affects buildings.

enchantress_impetus.name: Impetus
enchantress_impetus.scepterDescription: Increases attack range, and cast range of Impetus.

bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss.name: Shuriken Toss
bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss.scepterDescription: Allows Shuriken Toss to bounce twice on each hero.

weaver_time_lapse.name: Time Lapse
weaver_time_lapse.scepterDescription: Reduces cooldown, and allows Weaver to cast Time Lapse on an ally.

jakiro_macropyre.name: Macropyre
jakiro_macropyre.scepterDescription: Increases flame length, duration, and damage.

batrider_flaming_lasso.name: Flaming Lasso
batrider_flaming_lasso.scepterDescription: Flaming Lasso grabs both its target, as well as the target's nearest allied hero within 400 range. The secondary target is tethered to the first. Also causes Flaming Lasso to deal 100 damage per second.

chen_holy_persuasion.name: Holy Persuasion
chen_holy_persuasion.scepterDescription: Allows Holy Persuasion to target Ancient Creeps, maximum one per level of Hand of God.

doom_bringer_doom.name: Doom
doom_bringer_doom.scepterDescription: Will suspend Doom's duration while the affected unit is within 900 range. Also causes it to remove positive buffs from the target when cast, and break most passive abilities while active.

spirit_breaker_nether_strike.name: Nether Strike
spirit_breaker_nether_strike.scepterDescription: Causes the Greater Bash to hit an area around the initial target, decreases cooldown, and increases cast range.

ursa_enrage.name: Enrage
ursa_enrage.scepterDescription: Reduces cooldown and allows Ursa to use Enrage while disabled.

gyrocopter_call_down.name: Call Down
gyrocopter_call_down.scepterDescription: Adds a Side Gunner that at random attacks enemy units within a 600 radius every 1.1 seconds.

alchemist_chemical_rage.name: Chemical Rage
alchemist_chemical_rage.scepterDescription: Alchemist melts down Aghanim's Scepter to grant an allied hero all Aghanim's Scepter upgrades.

silencer_glaives_of_wisdom.name: Glaives of Wisdom
silencer_glaives_of_wisdom.scepterDescription: Causes Glaives to pierce Spell Immunity and deal 100% more damage against silenced units.

obsidian_destroyer_astral_imprisonment.name: Astral Imprisonment
obsidian_destroyer_astral_imprisonment.scepterDescription: Grants charges to Astral Imprisonment. Damage areas stack.

brewmaster_primal_split.name: Primal Split
brewmaster_primal_split.scepterDescription: Earth gains Thunder Clap, Storm gains Cinder Brew and Fire gains Drunken Brawler.

shadow_demon_demonic_purge.name: Demonic Purge
shadow_demon_demonic_purge.scepterDescription: Cooldown is removed, replaced with 3 charges that replenish every 60 seconds. Also causes Demonic Purge to break its target's passive abilities while active.

chaos_knight_phantasm.name: Phantasm
chaos_knight_phantasm.scepterDescription: Reduces cooldown to %cooldown_scepter% seconds and allows Phantasm to be cast on an allied hero. 1200 Cast Range

treant_overgrowth.name: Overgrowth
treant_overgrowth.scepterDescription: When Overgrowth is cast, it is also cast around Eye of the Forest to deal 175 damage per second.

naga_siren_song_of_the_siren.name: Song of the Siren
naga_siren_song_of_the_siren.scepterDescription: Song of the Siren regenerates all nearby allies for 10% of their health per second.

keeper_of_the_light_illuminate.name: Illuminate
keeper_of_the_light_illuminate.scepterDescription: Allows Illuminate to heal allies during the day for the same amount as its damage values.

keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form.name: Spirit Form
keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form.scepterDescription: Permanent Spirit Form. During daytime, grants unobstructed vision, and allows Illuminate to heal allies for the same amount as its damage values.

keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form_illumina.name: Illuminate
keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form_illumina.scepterDescription: Allows Illuminate to heal allies for 100%% of its damage values during daytime.

slark_shadow_dance.name: Shadow Dance
slark_shadow_dance.scepterDescription: Reduces cooldown and causes Shadow Dance active to be an area of effect ability, hiding nearby allied heroes underneath it.

medusa_mystic_snake.name: Mystic Snake
medusa_mystic_snake.scepterDescription: Causes Mystic Snake to turn enemies into stone for %stone_form_scepter_base% second, increases by  %stone_form_scepter_increment% seconds per bounce.

centaur_stampede.name: Stampede
centaur_stampede.scepterDescription: Heroes affected by Stampede take reduced damage, and are able to run through obstructions, including trees and up cliffs.

magnataur_shockwave.name: Shockwave
magnataur_shockwave.scepterDescription: Increases travel distance and speed, and causes Shockwave to come back. Return wave slows units, but deals half damage to creeps.

bristleback_viscous_nasal_goo.name: Viscous Nasal Goo
bristleback_viscous_nasal_goo.scepterDescription: Viscous Nasal Goo becomes a no target area of effect ability, applying to all enemies within range.

skywrath_mage_mystic_flare.name: Mystic Flare
skywrath_mage_mystic_flare.scepterDescription: Anytime Skywrath Mage casts an ability, a different random nearby target will be hit with the same ability. Heroes will take priority.

abaddon_borrowed_time.name: Borrowed Time
abaddon_borrowed_time.scepterDescription: Increases duration. While Borrowed Time is active, a percentage of all damage taken by allied Heroes in a radius will be redirected to Abaddon.

elder_titan_earth_splitter.name: Earth Splitter
elder_titan_earth_splitter.scepterDescription: Increases slow duration, and units pulled in by Earth Splitter are also disarmed.

legion_commander_duel.name: Duel
legion_commander_duel.scepterDescription: Increases Duel duration, makes Legion Commander Spell Immune in Duel, and makes Legion Commander and her opponent only take damage from each other.

abyssal_underlord_atrophy_aura.name: Atrophy Aura
abyssal_underlord_atrophy_aura.scepterDescription: Causes bonus damage to be granted to nearby allied heroes for half the values.

phoenix_supernova.name: Supernova
phoenix_supernova.scepterDescription: Increases number of attacks to destroy Supernova and allows Phoenix to cast Supernova on an allied hero, bringing both into the sun to be reborn together. Does not refresh ultimate abilities.

oracle_purifying_flames.name: Purifying Flames
oracle_purifying_flames.scepterDescription: Reduces cooldown and improves cast point.

winter_wyvern_arctic_burn.name: Arctic Burn
winter_wyvern_arctic_burn.scepterDescription: Causes Arctic Burn to be a toggle ability, draining 40 mana per second when active. Removes limit on number of attacks per target.
